statements: DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 5 AND pollutant_type = 'PM 2.5';
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND pollutant_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5' AND concentration > 50;
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND location = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM pollution_sources WHERE emission_rate > 1000 AND city = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM sensor_devices WHERE city = 'New York' AND device_type = 'Mobile';
DELETE FROM PollutionAlerts WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM Cities WHERE region = 'Asia' AND population > 1000000;
